content.description:
Sit start with good crimps and good feet. Trend up and right to equally positive crimps. End with a large move out right to a wrapper jug which will feel like a long ways away if yo momma didn't bless you with height.  

  Great problem characterized by bullet hard, popcorn-like stone that will keep you trying over and over. Begin your quest now.
content.protection: 2+ pads and a spotter. May seem dangerous with the opposing wall but it protects well.
content.location: First problem on your right upon entrance of the corridor.

content.description: In a way this " area " is hidden unless its pointed out. Its easy to just walk right by this as the trail curves down a short steep section and right around the corner is the corridor. You can miss this awesomeness if your focused on the steep section of the trail, by the time you look up you may have already passed it. A couple problems exist in the corridor and the quality can be unmatched at times. There is room for a few more projects.
